articles.description: Mobile apps are sometimes ‘regionalized’ to better serve the needs of users, functioning differently in, for example, China than in Canada. But some of those differences pose security and privacy risks.
articles.content: Google and Apple have removed hundreds of apps from their app stores at the request of governments around the world, creating regional disparities in access to mobile apps at a time when many economi… [+6309 chars]

articles.author: Sergiu Gatlan
articles.title: Windows 11 22H2 blocked due to blue screens on some Intel systems - BleepingComputer
articles.description: Microsoft is now blocking the Windows 11 22H2 update from being offered on some systems with Intel Smart Sound Technology (SST) audio drivers.
articles.content:
Microsoft is now blocking the Windows 11 22H2 update from being offered on some systems with Intel Smart Sound Technology (SST) audio drivers.
Redmond also put a safeguard hold in place because this… [+2393 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Leston
articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Quest Director Gets Emotional About Resurgence: 'It's F**king Good to be Back' - IGN
articles.description: Cyberpunk 2077 quest director Pawel Sasko says it's "f**king good to be back" after the game's recent surge in players.
articles.content:
Cyberpunk 2077 is seeing a huge resurgence, and the devs are loving it.
Speaking to fans on his Twitch channel (via GamesRadar), Cyberpunk 2077 quest director Pawel Sasko explained what it means to … [+2695 chars]

articles.author: Diamond Naga Siu, Hugh Langley, Tom Dotan
articles.title: Google Pays up to $1 Million. See What Engineers and Other Staff Make - Business Insider
articles.description: Insider analyzed thousands of Google's H-1B visa applications to get a sense of how much it pays employees.
